text: Lewis James Pullman (born January 29, 1993) is an American actor. He is the son of actor Bill Pullman. Pullman is known for his roles in The Strangers: Prey at Night (2018), Bad Times at the El Royale (2018) and Top Gun: Maverick (2022). Pullman played Major Major Major Major in Catch-22 (2019) and starred in Outer Range (2022â€“2024) and Lessons in Chemistry (2023). He will next star as Robert Reynolds / Sentry in the Marvel Cinematic Universe movie Thunderbolts* (2025) and Avengers: Doomsday (2026). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Lewis Pullman
